response.overview: his is a compilation of all the animation and live film that was created by Lone Bannana Productions, including a hidden "Old School" menu that shows the early "experimental" animations. This compilation includes: Animation Those Light Fingered Kelly's Animation Greed, Thy Name Is Scruffy Attack of the Vampire Ninja Bats Millie and Lucy: The Musical Sign Trainer Live Cliptomaniac What to do in a Zombie Attack Nestorfest Dead Mans Hand The Dark Side of Things Hell Is Work Old School Moster Trucks Dakotas Nice Day Graci Rabbit Depressed Blob
response.title: Lone Bannana Presents
